games.title: Marvel Rivals
games.description: A fast-paced, team-based shooter featuring iconic Marvel heroes and villains battling in dynamic environments.

games.title: The Forest
games.description: A survival horror game where players must build, craft, and fight against cannibalistic mutants after a plane crash in a mysterious forest.

games.title: Elden Ring
games.description: An expansive open-world action RPG by FromSoftware, blending deep lore, challenging combat, and breathtaking exploration in the Lands Between.

games.title: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: A futuristic open-world RPG set in the dystopian Night City, offering deep story-driven gameplay and intense action.

games.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: A stunning open-world western adventure featuring an immersive story and expansive exploration.

games.title: God of War Ragnarok
games.description: A Norse mythology-based action RPG following Kratos and Atreus on their journey through the Nine Realms.

games.title: Hogwarts Legacy
games.description: An open-world action RPG set in the Harry Potter universe, allowing players to experience life as a student at Hogwarts.

games.title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
games.description: A Viking-themed action RPG where players explore England and build their Norse settlement.

games.title: Resident Evil 4 Remake
games.description: A reimagined version of the classic survival horror game with modern visuals and improved gameplay mechanics.
